member.name: LVSETINFOTIP
member.summary: Provides information about tooltip text that is to be set.

member.name: LVSETINFOTIP.dwFlags
member.summary: Flag that specifies how the text should be set. Set to zero.

member.name: LVSETINFOTIP.pszText
member.summary: Pointer to a Unicode string that contains the tooltip text.

member.name: LVSETINFOTIP.iItem
member.summary: Value of type int that contains the zero-based index of the item to which this structure refers.

member.name: LVSETINFOTIP.iSubItem
member.summary: Value of type int that contains the one-based index of the subitem to which this structure refers.
